title: M2M
extract: From our perspective, M2M is an abbreviation for machine-to-machine and refers to wireless data communication between machines. While the technology continues to evolve, it generally refers to telemetry or telematics that is accomplished using networks, especially public wireless networks.Feb 23, 2009
